text:
My team is effectively
the layer between AWS

and all the eCommerce solutions
that we have at Amazon.

Something Amazon cares a lot
about is the Climate Pledge,

which is our pledge to get
carbon neutral in the future.
In order to do that,

one of the most important
things we need to do
is reduce the amount of electricity used
in our data centers.

But turns out that the AWS
Graviton instance types

are much more efficient
on performance per watt,
and also, performance per dollar.
So by embracing the Graviton technology,
we're able to reduce our carbon impact
and we're able to save money.
We found that with Graviton2,
we've saved 25 to 40% of the cost
for running our infrastructure.

With Graviton3, we're
able to save another 20+%.

And we're excited about
Graviton4, recently announced,
it'll enable us to save even more money.

When it's less expensive for
us to run our infrastructure,
we can offer lower prices.
Then, of course, it benefits everyone,

because our infrastructure
has less carbon impact.
